overview: TikTok sensation Kristen Scott has just turned 16, which is a big deal for every teenage girl, but for Kristen it presents a life-changing choice: she is now legally allowed to leave school to pursue her social media influencing career full-time.
tagline: Kristen has just turned 16 and is now legally allowed to leave school to pursue her social media influencing career full-time.
title: TikTok Queen at 16
